tool.name: Module 1
tool.command:
mkdir -p working_dir/genome_index_path "\$output_subdir" > debug_files_upload.txt 2>&1 || echo "mkdir failed" >> debug_files_upload.txt && cp "${sequencingdata}" working_dir/input.tar.gz 2>> debug_files_upload.txt && cp "${genomeindextar}" working_dir/genome_index_path/genome.tar.gz 2>> debug_files_upload.txt && cp "${adapterfile}" working_dir/adapter.fasta 2>> debug_files_upload.txt &&
{ tar --strip-components=1 --exclude='._*' -xzf working_dir/input.tar.gz -C working_dir 2>> debug_files_upload.txt && echo "Data extraction succeeded" >> debug_files_upload.txt; }|| { echo "Data extraction failed" >> debug_files_upload.txt; exit 1; } && { tar --exclude='._*' -xzf working_dir/genome_index_path/genome.tar.gz -C working_dir/genome_index_path 2>> debug_files_upload.txt && echo "Genome index extraction succeeded" >> debug_files_upload.txt; } || { echo "Genome index extraction failed" >> debug_files_upload.txt; exit 1; } &&
genome_index_name=`basename \`find working_dir/genome_index_path -name "*.rev.1.bt2" ! -name "._*" | head -n1\` .rev.1.bt2` && genome_index_name="working_dir/genome_index_path/\$genome_index_name" && echo "genome_index_name: \$genome_index_name" >> debug_files_upload.txt &&
echo "Command: $__tool_directory__/reads_preprocessing.sh -o \$output_subdir working_dir ${datasubdir} working_dir/adapter.fasta \$genome_index_name " >> debug_files_upload.txt && bash "$__tool_directory__/reads_preprocessing.sh" -o "\$output_subdir" working_dir "${datasubdir}" working_dir/adapter.fasta "\$genome_index_name" >> log.txt 2>&1 || { echo "Reads preprocessing script failed" >> debug_files_upload.txt; exit 1; } && echo "\$output_subdir" >> debug_files_upload.txt && { tar -czf compresseddata.tar.gz -C "\$output_subdir" . && echo "Output files compression succeeded"; } || { echo "Output files compression failed"; error_flag=1; } && echo "Main directory after input compression:" >> debug_files_upload.txt && ls -lh "\$output_subdir" >> debug_files_upload.txt

param.name: sequencingdata
param.label: Compressed_Data_Directory
param.help: Compressed directory with sequencing data for preprocessing (tar.gz)

param.name: adapterfile
param.label: Adapter_File
param.help: Upload adapter FASTA file for trimming.

tool.help:
This tool runs **Modules 1** of the biomarker discovery pipeline.
### What it does (in order) 1) Adapter trimming and quality filtering (Trimmomatic). 2) Alignment to the reference genome (Bowtie2). 3) Duplicate marking/removal. 4) MultiQC report generation (included in debug output, not shown separately in Galaxy).
### Inputs - **Compressed_Data_Directory**: Provide a `.tar.gz` archive containing raw sequencing data (e.g., paired-end FASTQ files). - **Data_Subdirectory**: Enter the name of the subdirectory within the dataset (e.g., `test_batch2025`). - **Genome_index_(Bowtie2)**: Upload a Bowtie2 genome index packaged as a `.tar.gz` archive. - **Adapter_File**: Upload a FASTA file containing adapter sequences for trimming.
### Outputs - **Compressed_Sample_bam_files_Directory**: Archive containing aligned BAM files after preprocessing, alignment, and deduplication. - **Log**: Text log of the pipeline run (`log.txt`). - **Debug_Output_Module1**: Debug information and reports (`debug_files_upload.txt`), including MultiQC summary files.
---
These outputs provide both the processed BAM files for downstream analysis and the accompanying logs/metrics for quality control and troubleshooting.
